body_html: it would also be awesome if there would be some function which easily writes examples in the given tfrecords file. A function you give a tensor of the for example a image and the label tensor for this image (one or multidim label) and it writes this to the tfrecord file.

body: it would also be awesome if there would be some function which easily writes examples in the given tfrecords file. A function you give a tensor of the for example a image and the label tensor for this image (one or multidim label) and it writes this to the tfrecord file.
